1.name: Department assignment
1.description: Associate each payment to a specific department

2.name: Product categorize
2.description: Categorize the payments to different products, according to the payments attributes

3.name: Business area categorize
3.description: Additional categorization level (on top of product level), of business area for each payment

4.name: Duplicate check
4.description: Check messages for duplication and rout failed messages to ‘Possible duplication’ Q.

5.name: Message Filter
5.description: A business rule that enables stopping the payment from entering the workflow and being processed.
